title: Coronavirus in Europe, Vote By Mail in 2020
itunes:title: Coronavirus in Europe, Vote By Mail in 2020
description:
Guests: Justin Sink, Bloomberg White House reporter, Ross Cullen, correspondent for Feature Story News in Paris, Adam Hodge, Senior Vice President at Ariel Investments, and Adam Goodman, Republican media strategist, columnist and partner at Ballard Partners in Washington.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
